C

Caption - Class in edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models
The Caption class is used to insert basic textual annotations into the graph itself in order to highlight points of interest.
Caption(double, double) - Constructor for class edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.Caption
Constructs an empty Caption at the specified location
Caption(double, double, String) - Constructor for class edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.Caption
Constructs a Caption with the specified text at the specified location
Caption(double, double, String, double) - Constructor for class edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.Caption
Constructs a Caption with the specified text and font size at the specified location
Caption(double, double, String, double, boolean) - Constructor for class edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.Caption
Constructs a Caption with the specified text, font size, and selection at the specified location
Caption(Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.Caption
Constructs a Caption from the specified map of properties
Caption(String) - Constructor for class edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.Caption
Constructs a Caption from the specified JSON text
